attributes.action: Hold no less than 2 main party televised debates before the General Election
attributes.background: In order for the pubic to know the policies of the main parties before a General Election the party leaders must appear in at least 2 televised debates to be held in the 4 weeks immediately before the election is held. The debates must include Conservative, Labour, Liberal Democrat, SNP and UKIP.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for the broadcasters to make, not the Government or Parliament.
